name: jak_rival_01
text: We're twice the dragon you'll ever be! That goes double for me.
text_simple: were twice the dragon youll ever be that goes double for me

name: jak_rival_02
text: There's no room in this world for a part time dragon. What he said.
text_simple: theres no room in this world for a part time dragon what he said

name: jak_rival_03
text: Dragon Knight, pfft, filthy half-breed. Well-said.
text_simple: dragon knight pfft filthy halfbreed wellsaid

name: jak_rival_04
text: You call that a flame, Lina? She's an amateur.
text_simple: you call that a flame lina shes an amateur

name: jak_rival_05
text: Lina, your flames are no shield against our cold. Or against our flames either.
text_simple: lina your flames are no shield against our cold or against our flames either

name: jak_rival_06
text: Now you know the true meaning of cold, Crystal Maiden. Nice.
text_simple: now you know the true meaning of cold crystal maiden nice

name: jak_rival_07
text: Crystal Maiden, you're a frozen puddle before us. Oh, good one.
text_simple: crystal maiden youre a frozen puddle before us oh good one

name: jak_rival_08
text: Did you see how Crystal Maiden gave us the cold shoulder? I noticed that.
text_simple: did you see how crystal maiden gave us the cold shoulder i noticed that

name: jak_rival_09
text: These skies belong to dragons, Batrider! Learn to walk!
text_simple: these skies belong to dragons batrider learn to walk

name: jak_rival_10
text: The clouds are no longer your domain, Zeus! You should be more down to earth!
text_simple: the clouds are no longer your domain zeus you should be more down to earth

name: jak_rival_11
text: A respectable chill, Apparition, but put some fire in it next time. More ice, too.
text_simple: a respectable chill apparition but put some fire in it next time more ice too

name: jak_rival_12
text: Puck, you needed more dragon, less fairy. Not that there's anything wrong with that.
text_simple: puck you needed more dragon less fairy not that theres anything wrong with that
